name: European Boating Industry
membership: MIF - Maritime Industries Forum (currently not active)
goal:
European Boating Industry is an international non-profit association established under Belgian law.

It has the task to represent, promote and protect the interests of the European leisure marine industry in Europe and worldwide, and also encourage the practice of boating and water sports as a healthy and friendly outdoor activity.

European Boating Industry gathers 11 national associations established in EU/EEA Member States and Switzerland.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Transport
